bibl.title: Greek Accents on Egyptian Names.
bibl.note: 1. How did Greeks accentuate foreign words and names? - 2. Accents on Egyptian names and words with Greek endings: 1. Names ending in -iw, gen. -evw or -iow; 2. Names ending in -euw, gen. -evw; 3. Names ending in -hw, genit. -ou; 4. Names ending in -hw, gen. -eouw or -eiouw; 5. Names ending in -ow, genit. -ou; 6. Names ending in vowel or diphthong + w, genitive in -tow; 7. Toponyms in neuter plural; 8. Individual cases. - 3. Accents on Egyptian words without Greek endings. <-is, -eos, -ios, -eus, -es, -ou, -eous, -eious, -os, -s, -tos>
